name: Redstone
description: Redstone is the $(thing)Minecraft$() equivalent of electricity. $(br2)Knowing the basics of redstone allows you to create amazing inventions. $(br2)You can obtain $(l:redstone/redstone_components#redstone)$(item)Redstone Dust$() by mining $(item)Redstone Ore$() underground. $(br2)You can spread this dust across the ground as wire, attach it to $(l:redstone/redstone_components#lever)$(item)Levers$() or $(l:redstone/redstone_components#door)$(item)Doors$(), and craft it into $(l:redstone/redstone_components#torch)$(item)Torches$() and $(l:redstone/redstone_components#repeater)$(item)Repeaters$() to build huge machines.
